messages.title: 25,000 INVITED TO MEET SHAILESH
messages.content: Shailesh's regular coffee mornings throughout the constituency, to which over 25,000 people have been invited, have proved very popular. Shailesh firmly believes it is vital to be in close contact with the people he represents in Parliament.

messages.title: GETTING ON WITH THE JOB
messages.content: Shailesh has worked hard and diligently for the local community. As well as taking the lead in many campaigns, he has helped many people and corresponded with thousands more on a variety of issues.

messages.title: A STRONG VOICE IN PARLIAMENT
messages.content: As Shadow Deputy Leader of the House of Commons, Shailesh has helped to hold the Labour Government to account. His participation in House business, whether it be written questions or contributions to debates, is well above average amongst MPs.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Deputy Leader of the House of Commons
politicalExperience.achievements: Helped to hold the Labour Government to account. Participation in House business, whether it be written questions or contributions to debates, is well above average amongst MPs.

contactInformation.address: Conservative Campaign Centre, Red House Farm, Woodwalton, Huntingdon, PE28 5YL
